name: Pip Dungeon
description:
PIP DUNGEON IMPORTANT (JAM):

The game was made using Fancade, a mobile game engine. Some of the elements that are inside the game are provided by the engine itself and should not be used as a factor when rating the game. This includes:

  • Pause Screen
  • Win / Lose Screen
  • Level Select

Everything else was made by me under 48 hours.

Also, although the game is playable on a browser, controls might appear janky in certain situations as the engine is more catered to mobile devices. However, this shouldn't affect your overall gameplay.

If the game doesn't load at first, just reload the webpage.

Play as a knight and traverse through puzzle-filled dungeons with the help of your trusty dice! Use your dice to indicate the spaces you have to move as you solve your way through 24 levels.

CONTROLS:

WASD / ARROW KEYS - Move

SPACEBAR - Jump

A submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Roll of the Dice
